description: Try our easy to follow Tiger Prawns With 3 Dipping Sauces recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Prawn dishes,Pescatarian,Prawn,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Mango,Peanut free
name: Tiger Prawns With 3 Dipping Sauces Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.5kg cooked tiger prawns, peeled, deveined, tails intact

recipeInstructions.text: To make spicy mango sauce, heat oil in a small pan over a medium heat. Add onion and cook for 3 minutes or until softened. Add curry powder and cook for 1 minute. Pour coconut milk into pan and bring to a simmer. Transfer mixture to a small food processor. Add mango and lime juice. Processor until a smooth sauce forms. Season with salt and white pepper. Pour into a serving bowl.

To make green goddess sauce, place avocado, sour cream, onion, garlic, parsley, coriander and lemon juice into a small food processor. Process until a smooth sauce forms, adding a little hot water, or until smooth and desired consistency. Season with salt and white pepper. Pour into a serving bowl.
To make Thai-flavoured sauce, combine chilli sauce, lime juice, sugar, fish sauce, vinegar and coriander in a bowl. Pour into a serving bowl.
Place prawns onto a large platter and serve with sauces and lemon cheeks.
